input.sentences: i took my son out to a halloween event today .
he was dressed up as a bird .
there were many people at the event .
we finally decided to sit down and get something to eat .
my kid did not want to stay put though .
output.sentences: It is Daisy's first time at the fair.
I can't tell if she likes it or not.
Everyone else brought out their little ones as well.
Here she is trying to steal my drink.
Isn't she just a cute handful?
